name: Holiday Jigsaw Halloween 4
description:
Holiday Jigsaw. Halloween 4 is an exciting jigsaw game for all the family! Put together 500 jigsaw puzzles made from high-quality photos. Enjoy the exciting atmosphere of this happy holiday as you solve puzzles! Exciting puzzles and funny tricks – all this awaits you in the new epic Holiday Jigsaw. Halloween 4.

For more enjoyable gameplay, we’ve allowed for a whole range of possibilities. Set a difficulty to suit you for each puzzle! Save your progress at any time! Convenient controls and a multitude of hints and tools make the game more comfortable to play.

Holiday Jigsaw. Halloween 4 brings you 500 of the best ideas for how to celebrate Halloween in the most fun and original way possible! Here you’ll find 5 themed collections of images: ideas for holiday decor, artistic autumn views, heartwarming family photos, varied treats and of course, a bunch of costumes for the party!

- 500 high quality unique images
- well designed game-play: useful hints, sort tool and magnifying glass.
- optional game difficulty control makes your gameplay infinite
- custom styles of pieces with rotation
- save game progress and continue to collect the puzzle at any time
- pleasant and relaxing music
- a happy holiday atmosphere
- get 500 puzzles for one purchase. It is beneficial!
